name: Darksiders II
description: Awakened by the End of Days, Death, the most feared of the Four Horsemen, embarks on a quest to undo Armageddon. Become the terrifying force which everything fears but nothing can escape. Wii U™ Darksiders II includes Bonus Content not included on the disc for other formats. Use the Wii U GamePad™ screen to instantly access inventory & abilities. E-manual is only available in English and French.
